titleStmt.title: The spirits touchstone: or, The teachings of Christs spirit on the hearts of believers. Being a cleare discovery, how a man may certainly know whether he be really taught of the spirit of God, being very useful for these times. / By J.R. late student of Merton Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Roys, Job, 1633-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Miller at the Star in St. Pauls Church yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Star in St. Pauls Church yard.
